content.question: Which of the following best summarizes Levineâ€™s major claim in this source?

choices.label: African Americans created a variety of musical genres.
The blues was formed as a rejection of traditional African music styles.
African Americans used musical expression to counter the horrors of racism.
The blues was part of the racial order of the United States.

content.answer: African Americans used musical expression to counter the horrors of racism.

topic.text: 3.14: Symphony in Black: Black Performance in Music, Theater, and Film

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
